content: to indicate end of instep knit 9 10 11 stitches and place cuff using 2 25mm needles loosely cast on 64 marker the beginning of the round is now the 70 80 stitches join being careful not to twist middle of the heel your stitches place marker to indicate beginning of round work rounds 1-4 of chart a 5 times gusset decreases round 1 decrease round knit to last 3 stitches using 2 5mm needles work set-up for leg before first instep marker k2tog p1 slip marker small/large *k6 p2 repeat from * to eor work 30 34 38 sts in pattern as established slip medium * k6 p1 repeat from * to eor marker p1 ssk knit to end of round round 2 knit around as established leg work rounds 1-24 of chart b twice repeat rounds 1- 7* of chart b once work 32 35 40 sts repeat these two rounds until 58 66 74 stitches in pattern pm to indicate start of instep work 30 remain 30 34 38 instep sts/28 32 36 sole sts 34 38 sts in pattern pm to indicate end of instep 30 34 38 instep sts/34 36 42 heel sts foot continue working in pattern as established until foot measures approximately 1 1/2 to 2 inches note *to knit a different leg length work chart b until less than desired foot length ending on row 8 or 20 desired length ending on row 7 or 19 of chart b set-up for heel right side set-up for toe knit to first instep marker slip small k1 p1 p2tog p4 p2tog p3 p2tog twice marker p9 10 11 p2tog p8 10 12 p2tog p9 p4 p2tog p1 k1 28 heel sts 10 11 pm to indicate new beginning of round 28 medium k1 p6 p2tog p5 p2tog 3 times p5 k1 32 36 instep sts/28 32 36 sole sts 32 heel sts large k1 p1 p2tog p4 p2tog p6 3 times knit even until foot measures approximately 1 1/4 1 p2tog p4 p2tog p1 k1 36 heel sts 1/2 1 3/4 inches less than desired foot length begin toe heel will be worked over 28 32 36 sts place remaining 30 34 38 sts on a holder for instep toe heel flap is worked back and forth round 1 decrease round k1 ssk knit to last 3 stitches before first instep marker k2tog k1 slip heel flap marker k1 ssk knit across in pattern as row 1 wrong side slip 1 p across turn established to last 3 stitches before second instep row 2 slip 1 *k1 slip 1 repeat from * to last 3 marker k2tog k1 sts ending with k3 turn round 2 k repeat row 1-2 until heel flap measures 2 1/4 to 2 work rounds 1-2 until 28 32 36 sts remain work 1/2 inches or desired length ending on row 2 decrease round only until 16 20 24 sts remain use kitchener stitch to graft toes turn heel row
